summary: Following the death of their friend, two girls in their late twenties embark on a road trip to spread his ashes. Seph and Alex take turns driving. Dan is in the glove compartment, in tupperware, decreasing in volume as the trip progresses.
cast: Laura Carmichael|Julian Rhind-Tutt|Joe Dempsie|Chloe Pirrie|Sally Phillips|Alice Lowe|Jane Asher|Hannah Arterton|Jack Farthing|Eleanor Matsuura|Susan Wokoma|Alison Steadman|Nigel Planer|Matthew Kelly|Melanie Walters|Tomos Eames|Lotte Rice|Bernardo Santos|Ekran Mustafa|Charles Reston|Kyle Lima|Anna Van Hoek|Rhys Rusbatch|Candy Says|Owen Findlay|Iestyn Arwel|Carole Bardsley|Lila Rodrigues|James Rowland
keywords: triple f rated|ashes|death|f rated|repetition in title
title: Burn Burn Burn
